pkgmetadata.longdescription: Kernel Density Estimation for Spatial Data // Calculate Kernel Density Estimation (KDE) for spatial data. The algorithm is inspired by the tool 'Heatmap' from 'QGIS'. The method is described by: Hart, T., Zandbergen, P. (2014) doi:10.1108/PIJPSM-04-2013-0039, Nelson, T. A., Boots, B. (2008) doi:10.1111/j.0906-7590.2008.05548.x, Chainey, S., Tompson, L., Uhlig, S.(2008) doi:10.1057/palgrave.sj.8350066.
